Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
Comments_List: I developed new ways of evaluating social networks and social phenomenon (like innovation adoption) through the lens of technological breakthroughs and algorithms. I also learned different technical frameworks to speak about social phenomena.

I would recommend this course to another student for pure intellectual purposes, and if they want to learn how to view the world in a different framework. Make sure to keep up with readings and attend section every time, as the TF is enormously helpful. Concepts may be totally new and confusing at first, especially if you don't have a technical background, but be patient and keep an open mind.
